message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $14,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price, and I'm happy to answer any questions you might have.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $10,000 for it. Would you consider adjusting your price?
Bob, thanks for the offer. I understand your position, however, the value of this product to me is considerably higher.  I could let it go for $13,000.  I think this is a fair compromise.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I am still unable to meet your price. However, I would like to counteroffer at $12,500. This is my final offer.
